document_data.name: Society of the Verdant Arrow
document_data.orgname: the Society of the Verdant Arrow
document_data.mainbody: The '''Society of the Verdant Arrow''' was an anti-human organization that met at [[Mytela Halvasyn's house]] around [[1368 DR]].
document_data.Organization:
The Society advocated for the banishment of [[human]]s from [[Aglarond]], thereby returning it to the way things were during the days of the [[Yuir elves]]. The members were particularly frustrated by the often-absent human ruler of Aglarond, [[the Simbul]], and strongly opposed the [[Sons of Hoar]].

The organization was led by [[Guthrae]] in [[1368 DR]], and later [[Caytran Halvasyn]] in [[1374 DR]].
document_data.Members: The organization was made up of the [[half-elf]] descendants of Lady [[Mytela Halvasyn]], namely those with significant wealth.
